pullrequest.title: Lowered CFL safety factor to 0.5; switched timestepper to SBDF2 for 3D run.

content.raw: Merging before we switch to GitHub.  We should keep thinking though about potentially splitting full-scale tests from the example scripts, because we want both performant versions and versions that are easy to generalize from.
content.html: Merging before we switch to GitHub. We should keep thinking though about potentially splitting full-scale tests from the example scripts, because we want both performant versions and versions that are easy to generalize from.
